com.tyrlib2.ai.steering

Interface IVehicle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUpdateable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PointMass

    public interface IVehicle
extends IUpdateable
    An interface for vehicles which will receive steer commands from the Behaviour layer.
    Author:
    Sascha
